seed_pair.known: Would they like to visit us on Tuesday?

S0418: They need to serve the community.
S0419: Si quieren que la gente los quiera.
If they want people to like them.
S0420: No necesitan preguntar cuántos años tiene.
They don't need to ask how old he is.
S0421: Porque ya saben que se está poniendo débil.
Because they already know he's getting weak.
S0423: Do they need to ask such an obvious question?
S0424: No están perdiendo el tiempo de todos.
S0425: Sí necesitan asegurarse de que entienden.
Yes they need to make sure they understand.
S0426: Les gustaría amarse pero están infelices.
They would like to love each other but they're unhappy.
S0427: No les gustaría que pienses que están aburridos.
They wouldn't like you to think that they're bored.
